Outlook.homeOpenPortal: Open the intranet page in a new window
Outlook.noActionsAvailable: No actions are available for this context.
Outlook.saveAttachmentDescription: Here you can save attachments as documents in the intranet.
Outlook.selectAttachmentDescription: Selected attachments will be saved in the target space.
Outlook.commentAttachmentDescription: This message will be posted in the activity generated for the saved attachment
Outlook.selectSaveSpaceDescription: Select the space where attachments should be saved
Outlook.pathInfoSaveDescription: Target folder in space's Documents where your attachments will be saved.
Outlook.saveAttachmentDescription: Save the attachments of this message as documents in the selected space
Outlook.cancelSaveAttachmentDescription: Don't save attachments of this message
Outlook.savedClickToOpen: Click a file in the list below to open it in teh intranet
Outlook.enterFolderNameAndCreate: Give a name to this new folder and click the Add button.
Outlook.pathInfoDescription: Target folder in space's Documentswhere your attachments will be saved.
Outlook.addAttachmentDescription: Attach selected documents to the message
Outlook.cancelAddAttachmentDescription: Cancel adding attachments to the message
Outlook.addedAttachment: Documents successfully attached to your message
Outlook.convertToStatusDescription: This message can be converted to a post in the activity stream. By default, it will go as a status update in your user stream. Chosing atarget space will generate the activity in the space's stream.
Outlook.targetSpaceDescription: If selected, your message will be saved in the space's activity stream.
Outlook.activityTitleDescription: This will be the title of your activity in the stream
Outlook.activityTextDescription: This will be displayed in the activity's body on the stream
Outlook.convertToStatusError: Error converting the message to an activity
Outlook.convertedToUserActivity: The activity was successfully posted in your personal activity stream
Outlook.convertedToSpaceActivity: The activity was successfully posted in {SPACE_NAME} space
Outlook.addAttachmentDescription: Attach documents from eXo portal to this message.

messages.folderHasNoPath: Error selecting folder - path not found. Try to reload the page.
messages.nothingSavedTryAgain: Nothing was saved. Please submit the form again or contact your administrator.
messages.gettingTokenError: Error getting access token for mail server
messages.attachmentNotSelected: No attachment selected. Check at least one and then submit the form again.
messages.menuNameUndefined: Menu name undefined. Please contact your administrator.
messages.youDontHaveSpaces: You are not a member of any space.
